title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 333.4 - Price approval or price adjustment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 333.4 - Price approval or price adjustment

State Regulations
(a) If the service will be covered by a formal contract, preferred source
designation will normally be granted for the period specified in the job
specifications. If no period of time is specified, or a formal contract is not
utilized, priority designation normally will be limited to a 12-month period. To continue priority designation beyond the specified or 12-month period, a new
request must be submitted 30 days prior to the end of the contract or 12-month
period, whichever is sooner. (b) Price adjustments will be considered at the time of request for renewal or
continuation, if accompanied by documentation. (c) Any change in the capability of a
handicapped organization must be included when requesting renewal or
continuation of a contract. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
333.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
